DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , randomize , study single clinical site investigate effect methylnaltrexone naloxone versus placebo healthy male receive short-acting opioid , remifentanil .
DOC.brief_title: Naloxone Intravenous Methylnaltrexone Effects Bladder Function
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male , 18 65 yr normal urinary function 2 . Body weight less 150 kg Body Mass Index 2032 . 1 . Females 2 . History drug alcohol abuse 3 . History significant chronic illness ( cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , neurologic , endocrine , renal , hepatic , etc . ) 4 . Subjects receive opioids one week long last 2 month .
